sentences.sentence: Her filthiness is in her skirts;
The problem of the heat power house pipe encrustation filthiness influences the normal running of dynamotors seriously.
sentences.translation: 热电厂输灰管道结垢问题影响发电机组的正常运行。

sentences.sentence: Then will I sprinkle clean water upon you, and ye shall be clean: from all your filthiness, and from all your idols, will I cleanse you.
sentences.translation: 我必用清水洒在你们身上，你们就洁净了。 我要洁净你们，使你们脱离一切的污秽，弃掉一切的偶像。
